package.name: AutoTouchUnlock
package.shortDescription: Auto unlock into homescreen after authentication on TouchID devices. If there's notifications/media controls etc. (see tweak settings page) on your lockscreen after authenticated, simply rest your finger on TouchID to go to homescreen. Support iOS 13.

descriptionlist.description: Auto unlock into homescreen after authentication on TouchID devices. If there's notifications/media controls etc. (see tweak settings page) on your lockscreen after authenticated, simply rest your finger on TouchID to go to homescreen. Support iOS 13.
